Valid nesting:

Link

Link

Invalid nesting:

[Link](url)

Correct nesting:

  1. test test
  2. test test
  3. test test
  4. test test
  5. test test
  6. test test
  7. test test
  8. test test
  9. test test
  10. test test

Incorrect nesting:

  • test test
  • test test
  • test test
  • test test
  • test test
  • test test

Code spans <!-- and --> on two lines.

Code spans <!-- and --> on three lines.
